name: Highway Race: Traffic Racing
description:
Sick of getting late everywhere? Forget the signs and beat the traffic! Show your skills at the steering wheel and avoid the cars coming at you. But, careful! Don't hit the other vehicles or prepare to crash.
Select your favorite car, choose one out of the four available racing modes and feel the adrenaline while you speed up on a highway full of traffic. The further and faster you get, the more you can update your car.
Becoming the master of the road is no easy job, play every day and collect your daily rewards! Do you accept the challenge?

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:
- 7 Unlockable Cars
- 4 Unlockable Game Modes
- Custom Difficulty
- Custom Weather
- Multiple Levels
-Daily Rewards
